meanings.sent1: The dynamometric tool was used to measure the strength of the bridge.
meanings.sent2: The dynamometric equipment helped determine the weight of the object.

meanings.sent1: The dynamometric device accurately gauged the pressure applied to the lever.

meanings.sent3: The dynamometric scale comically exaggerated the force of the tiny kitten.
